name: random-walk
description: A web application to discover and track random walks to interesting local places

scripts.dev: npm run build:frontend && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:push:versioned && npm run docker:push:latest
scripts.docker:release: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push && npm run docker:update-compose
scripts.docker:update-compose: sed -i.bak 's|image: yourusername/random-walk:.*|image: yourusername/random-walk:v'$(node -p require('./package.json').version)'|g' docker-compose.yml && rm -f docker-compose.yml.bak
scripts.version:sync: npm run version:sync:frontend && npm run version:sync:backend
scripts.release: npm run version:sync && npm run docker:release && git add . && git commit -m 'Release v'$(node -p require('./package.json').version) && git tag v$(node -p require('./package.json').version)
